text: Saman Arbabi (; born 1973) is an Iranian-American journalist, caricaturist, television host, fashion designer, and television producer. He was the creator and executive producer of the satirical television show Parazit. He was born in Tehran, Iran in 1973. He moved to France in 1984, and then he moved to the United States in 1986. He has a Bachelor of Science in Communications from the University of Maryland. ==Other websites== * *Edeaa, directed by Saman Arbabi *Demokracy, directed by Saman Arbabi *Saman Arbabi's Reel *Parazit's Press Reel *Saman Arbabi's Twitter feed *Saman Arbabi's Facebook page *Saman Arbabi's Instagram page Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Writers from Tehran Category:Iranian journalists Category:American television presenters Category:Fashion designers Category:Television producers
title: Saman Arbabi
